# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Standing Offer (RFSA): RISO Light Vehicule Body Repair Services

**Reference Number:** WS4246973885
**Publication Date:**  October 27, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:**  November 20, 2023 at 14:00:00

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) for the provision of Light Vehicule Body Repair Services.

**Description of Services:**

The successful contractor will provide the following services:

* Repair and maintenance of light-duty motor vehicle bodies
* Repair and minor mechanical work on accident-damaged light-duty vehicles
* Painting of accident-damaged light-duty motor vehicle bodies
* Transportation services for vehicles in working order

**Opportunities:**

This RFSA is open to Canadian businesses and is in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Operations:**

The successful contractor will be required to provide services in the province of Quebec.

**Procurement Method:**

This RFSA utilizes a competitive select tendering process to obtain the lowest price.

**Contact Information:**

For further information, please contact:

* Annie Deslauriers, PSPC/
* Phone: N/A
* Email: [annie.deslauriers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:annie.deslauriers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Additional Information:**

* The notice is available on the Ariba Discovery website.

The revised text reduces unnecessary information and phrases, maintains clarity, and follows the standard structure of a call for tender. The important details are kept including the description of services, opportunities, and procedures for submission and evaluation.

Limitations of the rewritten text are:

* It still includes both English and French text, whereas typically a tender notice would have one set of language.
* It does not incorporate any responsiveness and solicitation criteria.
